extracted_text:
(2) Minimum square footage per units: 4,000 square feet for the first unit and 2,500 square
feet in addition for each unit over one for apartments with two or more bedrooms, and 2,000 square
feet for each unit over one for one-bedroom apartments.
llm_outputs.rationale: The section on page 67 provides the minimum square footage per unit for apartments within the specified zoning district. It distinguishes between apartments with two or more bedrooms and one-bedroom apartments.
llm_outputs.answer: 4,000 sq ft for the first unit, 2,500 sq ft for each additional unit (two or more bedrooms), 2,000 sq ft for each additional unit (one-bedroom)
